sorcer.security.sign

Class TaskAuditor.AuditThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.security.sign.TaskAuditor.AuditThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    TaskAuditor

    protected class TaskAuditor.AuditThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Inner class of TaskAuditor< whih starts a new thread to start looking for Auditor Provider. It takes the Subject from AccessController and makes a new ServiceContext with this subject and the task that needs to be saved.
    See Also:
    TaskAuditor
